statements: SELECT * FROM eco_materials_inventory;
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM eco_materials_inventory;
SELECT material_quantity, material_price FROM eco_materials_inventory WHERE material_category = 'Eco-Friendly';
SELECT material_name, material_category, material_quantity FROM eco_materials_inventory ORDER BY material_quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM eco_materials_inventory WHERE material_price > 50 ORDER BY material_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM eco_materials_inventory;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_category FROM eco_materials_inventory WHERE material_quantity > 0 ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM eco_materials_inventory WHERE material_category = 'Plastic' AND material_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM eco_materials_inventory WHERE material_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY material_price ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_category, material_quantity FROM eco_materials_inventory WHERE material_category IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_qty FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT * FROM components ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT component_name, component_qty FROM components WHERE component_qty > 10;
SELECT material_name, component_name, component_qty FROM materials JOIN components ON materials.material_id = components.component_material_id;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal' ORDER BY material_qty DESC;
SELECT component_name, component_qty, material_name FROM components JOIN materials ON components.component_material_id = materials.material_id WHERE component_qty > 10 ORDER BY component_qty ASC;
SELECT material_name, SUM(component_qty) AS total_qty FROM materials LEFT JOIN components ON materials.material_id = components.component_material_id GROUP BY material_id HAVING total_qty > 50;
SELECT material_name, AVG(component_qty) AS avg_qty FROM materials JOIN components ON materials.material_id = components.component_material_id GROUP BY material_id HAVING avg_qty < 20;
SELECT material_name, component_name, material_qty * component_qty AS total_material_qty FROM materials JOIN components ON materials.material_id = components.component_material_id;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM eco_friendly_materials WHERE material_type = 'Paper';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT component_name, material_name FROM components INNER JOIN eco_friendly_materials ON components.material_id = eco_friendly_materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE component_type = 'Glass' OR component_type = 'Metal';
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_materials WHERE material_type='Recycled' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM eco_friendly_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT component_name, material_name, quantity FROM components INNER JOIN eco_friendly_materials ON components.material_id = eco_friendly_materials.material_id ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, component_name, quantity FROM inventory INNER JOIN components ON inventory.component_id = components.component_id ORDER BY inventory_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE component_type='Biodegradable' AND material_id IN (SELECT material_id FROM eco_friendly_materials WHERE quantity < 50) ORDER BY component_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE material_type='Steel';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location='USA';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_id, supplier_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'metal';
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City%';

SELECT t.transaction_id, m.material_name, s.supplier_name, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN materials m ON t.material_id = m.material_id JOIN suppliers s ON t.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE t.quantity > 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT m.material_name, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM materials m JOIN inventory i ON m.material_id = i.material_id GROUP BY m.material_name HAVING total_quantity > 5000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_materials;
SELECT material_name, price FROM eco_friendly_materials ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN eco_friendly_materials ON inventory.material_id = eco_friendly_materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_materials;
SELECT material_name, price FROM eco_friendly_materials WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN shipments s ON o.order_id = s.order_id WHERE o.quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM inventory i JOIN eco_friendly_materials m ON i.material_id = m.material_id WHERE i.quantity < 50;
